阠字的基本解释

阠
xìn
古陵名。

阠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xìn］
［《廣韻》息晉切，去震，心。］
陵名。

阠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　阠； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1345第15
【廣韻】息晉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】思晉切，?音信。【說文】陵名。【爾雅·釋地】東陵阠。　又【唐韻】所臻切【集韻】疏臻切，?音莘。又【集韻】所陣切，音?。又【廣韻】【集韻】?試刃切，音抻。義?同。

阠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
阠字的起名意思

暂无。

Hang
xìn
The name of the ancient tomb.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xìn］
["Guangyun" Xi Jinqie, to shake, heart. ]
Mausoleum name.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　阠; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1345 No. 15
[Guang Yun] Xi Jin Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Thinking Jin Qi,? News. [Said Wen] The name of the mausoleum. [Erya·Shidi] Donglingkan.　 [Tang Yun] So Zhen Qi [Ji Yun] Shu Zhen Qi,? Yin Xin. Also 【Jiyun】The array cuts, the sound?. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Try cutting edge, sound stretch. Righteous? Same.
